instruction: Fetch the configuration of the transformation from SimpleClass to SimpleRDBMS, then Display the configuration of the transformation from XML to PetriNet.

- get the configuration of the Grafcet to PetriNet transformation
- apply the Families to Persons transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Families2Persons/sample-Families.xmi to a Persons model

Transform /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Class2Relational/Class.xmi to Relational model.
Retrieve the configuration for the mapping from Java source to table.

1) Retrieve configuration for the Partial to totalRoleB transformation
2) Apply to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/MakePartialRoleTotal/MakingPartialRolesTotalB/with_context/InputModels/exampleB-KM3.xmi; target model: totalRoleB
Show me the configuration settings of the current session and then show me the configuration settings of the transformation from a Table to TabularHTML

- List features of the XML-to-PNML transformation
- Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/PNML2XML_example.xmi to PNML model

1) List features
2) Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/RSS2ATOM/ATOM/Exemple-ATOM.xmi to RSS model
Transform ./examples/input.xmi to MOF model and Get the configuration details for the mapping from XML to MySQL

1) Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Table2MicrosoftOfficeExcel/modelsExamples/TableModelExample.xmi to SpreadsheetMLSimplified
2) Get configuration for the mapping from SpreadsheetMLSimplified to Relational

Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SimpleClass2SimpleRDBMS/Sample-SimpleClass.xmi; TARGET: SimpleRDBMS
Get the XML output configuration for the subsequent transformation

- Get configuration for the transformation from XML to RSS.
- Apply to '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/KM32Problem/Models/test-KM3.xmi' Target model: Problem.

Retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts Partial to totalRoleA.
Retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts Ant to XML.

Show me the configuration of the transformation that converts XML to Book.
Show me the configuration of the transformation that converts Table to TabularHTML.

Retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts a PetriNet to PNML.
Retrieve the configuration of the transformation that converts a PathExp to PetriNet.

- Get the configuration for the Maven-to-Ant transformation.
- Apply on /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/UML22Measure/. Target: Measure model.

Retrieve configuration for the XML-to-DXF transformation.
Apply /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/KMLInjector/InputModels/example-XML.xmi to KML model.
Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts a Book into a Publication. Show me the configuration settings of the transformation that converts an A into a B.

- Show me the configuration settings of the transformation from Measure to Table
- Show me the configuration settings of the transformation from PetriNet to PathExp

Show me the configuration settings of the transformation from KM3 to DSL.
Show me the configuration settings of the transformation from KM3 to a Problem model.

get the configuration of the transformation that converts a Table to SpreadsheetMLSimplified.
apply the XML to Ant transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Ant2Maven/example/build1.xmi; TARGET: Ant model
